ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] How the hell do I take someone off moderated status?
ygData.msgSnippet: Su... Go to management (left-hand column of group home page), then choose messages from group settings (options available on right-hand side of screen).
ygData.messageBody:
Su...
 
Go to "management" (left-hand column of group home page), then choose "messages" from "group settings" (options available on right-hand side of screen).  Then click on "edit" next to "posting and archives".  You can change it from there.
 
Hope that helps!
 
Jennifer 
Athiarna Aoibhell
51 Monk, Disciple
Bristlebane

----- Original Message ----
From: Su <suceress@...>
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: January 13, 2006 5:01:48 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] How the hell do I take someone off moderated status?

There are a few people that have been posting well but it still has
them on moderated status and I cannot for the life of me find the
command in stupid yahoo to remove individual people from moderated
status. I have looked all through Management, Messages, Members,
Posting, etc and cannot find the bloody thing.
Yahoo's help page was not very helpful. It didn't say where to find the
option. UGH!
I apologize to the people who have been trying to post and have to
wait. It's pissing me off that I can't find the thing to unmoderate...
luv,
-Su
